text: Majid Ayoubi (); is an Iranian Football defender who currently plays for Iranian football club Saipa in the Iran Pro League. ==Club career== ===Early years=== Ayoubi started his career with Shamoushak from youth levels. He also spent few seasons with Nassaji. ===Saipa=== He joined Saipa in summer 2001 and since then he has been a regular player of the club.
